channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: It?s the legendary Agent Overhill?s last day at Odd Squad, and their mysterious nemesis is still causing oddness. Can Orwell help Overhill finally catch Villain X.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: A bully at school is bothering Charlie, but when Frank the Monster comes back into their lives, Charlie sees a chance for revenge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Pop sensation Zoe Now (Nadine Coyle) is coming to officially open Pottsfield leisure centre?s new reception. Joy tasks Danny and Mick with looking after the star guest but get in a tangle with the opening ribbon. Zoe Now arrives but Danny?s attempts at hospitality leave her without a voice - minutes before she?s due to sing. With the aid of a cap and wig from lost property, lots of smoke and a backing track, Danny reckons nobody will spot the difference if he takes her place. Mick plays Zoe?s hit song over the PA for Danny to mime to, but he gets too in the moment and accidentally skips the music tracks. After Danny initially busks it to save the day, they are found out. But Mick surprises the crowd with a fantastic acoustic rendition of the Zoe Now track which Zoe is very impressed with.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 9-11 Year Olds
channel.desc: Learn about decimal place value, column method using decimals, and decimal problem solving.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blow Your Mind
channel.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand van Tulleken bring you the top experts on the planet to show you things that will blow your mind. In this episode they find out about brainy birds. Chris Packham visits a safe-cracking parrot called Muppet, a watch-stealing cockatoo called Olympia and unbelievably, some time-travelling birds.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: The girls get a big surprise when they find themselves back in Victorian times to experience a day as students. From calligraphy to cricket, and with watery cabbage as fuel, how will the girls cope.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall encounters a seriously smooth shark - the silky shark. Diving off the coast of Cuba, Steve comes face to face with these open ocean operators. With a tail that propels them forward, and supersmooth skin they are like silver bullets in the sea. However, there's more to their metallic-looking skin than meets the eye. In his shark lab, Steve reveals how their skin helps to make them seriously streamlined.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: Meet the zoo?s powerful animals as Sonika the Asiatic lioness gets a grip in a tug-of-war and Tyler takes on Marion the sulcata tortoise in a contest of strength.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Nine-year-old Becca and her twin brother, Charlie, loved their new chinchillas. However, one of them was pregnant and gave birth and the only way to save them from being rehomed is to have a chinchilla den.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Poppies
channel.desc: BBC Children's remembrance film. A beautiful and evocative animation that sees war as experienced by animals in a WWI battlefield.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand turn back the clock and look at what medicine was like in the First World War. They meet a Paralympian runner who swaps her awesome blade for a World War I leather leg, and they look at the little critters that infested the trenches. Then they set up a massive experiment to demonstrate how soldiers' bodies had to cope with the pressures exerted by huge explosions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall reveals the supersucker of all sharks, the nurse shark. This shark has a taste for shellfish and armoured crustaceans. In Mexico, Steve finds one resting amongst the coral and explains how the nurse shark uses specialist sensory barbells to detect its prey in the sand or crevices. However, to understand how it actually eats its prey, we join Steve in his shark lab.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A special episode of the historical sketch show featuring all your favourite rotten rulers from the series. Including naughty Napoleon annoying his Josephine and horrid Henry VIII getting married again! There's also a song from wily Winston Churchill and, of course, our host Rattus to guide the way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Webbthorpe?s Surprising Amazing Cake competition is ready to go. However, after a mishap with one of the competitors? unbelievable cakes, Danny and Mick take it upon themselves to create the best illusion cake ever, which is a huge surprise to Joy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Secret Life of Boys
channel.desc: Hoping to get even more subscribers, Chris hosts his own online show with Bob, Corey, Thane, Matt and even celebrity Dani Harmer making appearances.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. Olive and Otto are sent to Shapely Manor to investigate an odd crime with even odder people.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Join Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers for more deep sea adventures. When a population of crawfish is stricken by a mysterious illness, the Octonauts race to find a cure.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Dad drops an essential gizmo in a hard-to-reach place. Big Lizard takes them on an underwater adventure to meet Ammon, the tentacled solution to their problem.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Whilst waiting to pick up Penfold?s vacationing cousin from New Zealand, Pinfold, at the airport, Danger Mouse receives orders to stop Burt Badboy?s spree of mass statue defacement. When Penfold pops to the toilet moments before Pinfold arrives, a distracted DM mistakenly jets off with Penfold?s cousin in tow, leaving Penfold stranded at the airport. As DM races off to stop Badboy, unwittingly bringing Pinfold along for the ride, Penfold commandeers various modes of transport hoping to catch up with them at Nelson?s Column, a pristine tempting target for Badboy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold?s countless hours spent playing Giraffe Warriors pay off when he gets the highest score of all time. Before he can celebrate and convince Danger Mouse that a video game win is a real life win, the pair are whisked off to the planet which inspired the game, where Penfold is asked to defend it from an alien invasion! With DM sidelined Penfold must take up the mantle of the last giraffe warrior, a hero destined to save the planet from peril.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface?s hat has been stolen by a Big Ole Worm, and the heroes must quest to get it back. As they trail the worm through the Prickly Desert, Trevor accidentally spikes himself all over on a cactus. But all is not lost ? now that he is covered in sharp spikes, Trevor realises that he has a unique superpower, and when the time comes to confront the Big Ole Worm, it?s Spiky Trevor to the rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: After the battery dies on her laser shoe, special agent Gloria Hope calls on the Ninjas to help her find a new one and foil criminal mastermind Pam D'Terre.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: The winner of the Blue Peter Walking with Dinosaurs Competition is revealed! One lucky viewer joins Joel on a Canadian adventure in search of dinosaurs. Joel meets the firefighting teams responding to wildfires and discovers if he has what it takes to become a rancher on a farm.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Leah?s mum pressures her to treat Christina as a rival, testing their friendship and leading to a spicy football game. Hawx CEO Gordon tries to keep the club?s new sponsors happy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV, but the Lemmings prefer to have fun playing music.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation about Shaun's adventures on a remote rural farm. The Farmer's metal detector looks like fun until it detects the ring on a bull's nose.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis is on his last warning ? one more prank in school and he will be sent to Grim Lane School. While he struggles to sustain a prank-free day, Walter conspires to make Dennis fail and get thrown out of school.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is acting very strangely indeed. He refuses to stamp any of Admin Bunny?s documents, keeps getting distracted by butterflies, and seems oddly happy! The heroes are extremely suspicious and decide that someone must have swapped him with a doppelganger. Now they must quest to find out where the real Friendlyface is and get him back before the forest descends into total chaos.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When one of Mouse?s inventions accidentally sticks Cat?s discarded fur to Boy?s face, his new 'beard' suddenly makes him the most popular kid in school! Seeing her chance to stop her enemy Lila Bird from becoming class president, Girl convinces Boy to run for president too. It looks like Boy might win, until another accident causes Cat?s whole body to get stuck to his face. Can he win the election with such a strange new beard.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The Girls and the Boys compete to get to the top of Bear Mountain, using very different styles of camping. But when the legendary bear appears, they have to team up to survive.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are pursued by a stone giant.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Heat-loving hippies move into Mr Krabs' soup vat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Little Lunch
channel.desc: Battie?s grandfather is the guest of honour at Grandparents' Day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When he's unable to use the tube system, Onom has to use different types of transport to get 15 creature eggs to Orli and Ozzie before it?s too late.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: When Helsing's past failures are exposed, the gang travel back through time to help him succeed. But young Helsing is a lot different to what they expected.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Owen is excited to have a new snowsuit but annoys his friends when he puts it to the test.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Memories come flooding back when Orla is asked to build a new airship.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Lady Noire and Mister Bug are back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Follow the next generation of footballers at Hawx United. Have they got what it takes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: Jo discovers Lily Vernon hiding out in the abandoned cottage and agrees to help her in secret. Meanwhile, Alicia decides Darrell needs to relax and plans their final midnight feast.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Gaining newfound appreciation for their teammates, Carter and Skye team up against Glen and Zane to build a Shard to lure in Baron Durghon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall meets a night-time ninja. The whitetip reef shark has a cool and calm character by day, but after dark they turn into highly honed hunters. Scouring the reef, they search out prey that's hiding away in coral caves. Steve gets a closer look at them off the coast of Malaysian Borneo and gets under their skin in his Shark Lab to explain how they can fit where other sharks can't.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Timmy accidentally eats a tomato grown with miracle-grow fertiliser and expands to become the King Kong of sheep. Shaun must keep the giant toddler out of sight while trying to figure out how to return him to normal size.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Colonel K spins a terrifying tale about the Headless Postman - an ancient and alarmingly scary apparition. When the haunting figure of the postman suddenly appears, petrified panic reigns supreme amongst the Danger Agents, until Squawkencluck reveals herself as the postman in disguise and that the whole scenario has been a company-mandated bravery test. By remaining characteristically unfazed throughout, Danger Mouse fails the exam, which puts his job at risk, as in Squawk's words 'being truly brave means being afraid of something and still taking it on'. The gang try to scare DM, but he's fearless... until he discovers that the Headless Postman lives.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Only wood elves have ever defeated the mighty Eye of Vernon hat, so when the Riddlemaster wears the eye to take over the forest, the heroes quest to Wood Elf Wood to get help. However, Twinkle really doesn?t want to, as wood elves are so stuck up! Struggling to contain her irritation with their high-and-mighty ways, Twinkle still manages to offend them, and the heroes wonder how they will ever save the forest now.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Boy has planned a perfect sleepover with best friend Tuck that will feature bobblehead-themed activities. However, Boy gets jealous when Tuck keeps getting distracted by his siblings' antics.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings discover a tree with chocolate spread sap.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings get a magical Mayan disc that transforms them into mutants.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Mr Krabs makes Larry the Lobster temporary manager.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Orli and a different Ozzie from a movie star dimension need to stop a villain who?s making the town go purple one person at a time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Charlie uses a magic wand to make his life easier by becoming a ghost! However, ghost life is harder than Que makes it look.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy wants to open a luxury spa centre at Pottsfield, and Danny?s done every single job on the list, correction, on one side of the list! With influential vlogger Luke Cutforth coming to be the spa?s first guest, Danny and Mick have to race to put together a luxury spa treatment from whatever they can find - not to mention finding a world class Swedish massage expert... Mick.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 5-7 Year Olds
channel.desc: Recognise recurring language in texts, homophones, and using a dictionary.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blow Your Mind
channel.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand van Tulleken bring you the top experts on the planet to show you things that will blow your mind. In this episode they find out about animals with human-like behaviours. Chris Packham visits elephants that talk to each other, dolphins that sing to one another and also unearths a deadly dinosaur-dolphin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: The girls have a love\/hate relationship with swimming, but friends Liyana and Jyot are on a mission to put the fun back into the sport. How will the girls cope when faced with the challenge of a cold-water plunge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: DIY Deadly with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: In this episode, Steve delves into the lives of perhaps the most popular of all deadly animals - the fast-striking, super-sinuous slithering snakes. Steve is wowed by a grass snake?s hunting technique, shows us how to work out whether an adder is male or female, and explains what to do to attract snakes to your green space! In a DIY demo, Steve gives us a privileged view of one of his most prized possessions ? a puff adder skeleton in all its glory! We see that this venomous viper can strike in the blink of an eye, and that corn snakes are awesome pets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The brothers learn all about different types of cosy animal dens. Bird expert Nadeem helps Cam build a bird box, and Aaron reveals why the Asiatic lion is most endangered.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Twelve-year-old Ashley needs an opera-themed den so he can sing to his heart's content. He has Tourette syndrome and singing helps him to overcome it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Dr Chris takes a terrifying, stomach-turning ride in an aerobatic display plane to explain what happens to your body when you feel travel sick. The doctors put on their pyjamas to investigate all about sleep, and Xand finally finds out if he really does snore! Also, Dr Chris goes on call with an emergency ambulance team. Meanwhile, over in accident and emergency, one patient is suffering from mysterious tummy pains and another has an injured hand after an accident involving a race in a high-heeled shoe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A special episode of the historical sketch show, featuring ghastly Genghis Khan, the wise Confucius and a dance-off during a naval battle! There's also a Bollywood number from Queen Victoria. With Rattus to guide the way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Danny and Mick?s dad, Clive, arrives with an ice cream van and ropes in the brothers to help set it up. The excited duo get to work, with Mick creating the music, and Danny serving the ice creams - if only they could keep the customers, and Joy, happy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Secret Life of Boys
channel.desc: Keen to avoid the annual Pranksgiving clear-up, Bob and Corey leave Granny Bob in charge. She attempts to get the house (and Matt's love life) in order in her own inimitable way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. Olive and Otto are sent to Shapely Manor to investigate an odd crime with even odder people.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Join Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers for more deep sea adventures. The Octonauts wade through a swamp to find a lost flamingo chick before hungry predators do.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Whilst searching for new discoveries, a rockfall traps Dad, Cosima and Big Lizard in a cave. Just when all is lost, Dad finally discovers a new species.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold are introduced to Squawk?s latest invention ? a warp drive device that will transport HQ anywhere in the universe at a moment?s notice. Squawk?s demonstration seems to go without a hitch - that is until the gang notice an exact duplicate of the HQ across the road, with identical duplicates of the Danger Team inside. When the duplicate Big Head is activated and starts causing mayhem the two DMs join forces to try and stop her.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Clip show. The danger agents are at the annual Supies awards show, eagerly awaiting the results. But as Duckula calls out Danger Mouse?s name time and time again Penfold, Squawk and Colonel K?s hopes of winning anything slip away.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The forest has run out of bath sponges and is becoming very stinky. Their latest order never arrived, and so the heroes must quest under the sea to Merhaven to collect them. However, Hoofius, whose singing stinks worse than his armpits, decides to enter the annual Merhaven Song Contest and accidentally causes a simple quest to collect bath sponges to turn into something much more perilous.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: To help a museum security guard who has spilt his drink over a kilt on display, the Ninjas must travel to the Highlands to compete in a tournament and win a replacement.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Goalie Reks steps up to play for the Spurs cerebral palsy men?s team. Riley and Maddie join the under-15s, and Ledley King is in Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Alex struggles to adjust to 11-a-side football. Coach Byrne and Finn spend a day together trying to have fun, while Simon takes charge of the team, with mixed results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: A rocket carries the cabin into space.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Bitzer has a terrible toothache, so Shaun turns dentist in an attempt to cure his woes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and the gang can?t wait for their all-day PE training day with Grizzly Griller and are baffled when their idol makes them learn a range of boring non-sports that only Walter excels at.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface is particularly tetchy this morning. He is packing for a skiing trip, but a dragon has pinched his golden fleece, and he urgently needs the heroes to quest it back ? how else will he stay warm and cosy on the slopes? However, when the heroes accidentally agree to let his niece Trixie tag along with them, they fear that her clumsiness and lack of hero skills will ruin everything.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Girl enters a cosplay costume contest to win a trophy and meet her favourite TV star, but needs somebody to wear the back end of her enormous costume. Boy is horrified at dressing as the character?s bum, but he doesn't want to let his sister down. Can he put aside his embarrassment to help Girl win the competition.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mum and Dad take the TV away until the kids learn to behave, and the siblings realise they need some rules. Mouse is the judge and decides how to settle family arguments, putting wrongdoers into a homemade jail. However, when Mouse also behaves badly, he puts himself in jail, and the family realise they are all locked in.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Lacking electricity, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a tiara that controls fireflies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Man Ray rents Squidward's house.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Little Lunch
channel.desc: Melanie decides to have a cake stall to raise money for homeless puppies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Orli takes on too many jobs. She must juggle questioning a villain, changing the watermelon, and her commitments to various Odd Squad societies on the same day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: It?s Dracula?s 600th death day, and every monster, hunter and chores kid is invited - except Charlie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Duncan stages a small coup to oust Courtney as their new official class fire officer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: The Rising Volt Tacklers reunite and prepare to take to the skies once more.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug discovers the secrets of her kwagatama.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Growing up is hard; growing up autistic is harder. Can Addie work out what?s next.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Now she knows the truth about Wigmo, Leah decides to take action - but how much will it cost her? Simon and Ryan attempt to unsettle Jay.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: With their friends stuck on Grimdar, Carter must rescue them with Glen's help. However, getting to Grimdar requires the help of a Gormian engineer who shares a rocky past with one of the Gormiti.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall meets a shark that is the master of moves. The Caribbean reef shark has lightning-quick reaction times and is one seriously flexible fish. Steve heads to the Bahamas in the Caribbean to swim alongside them, before finding out the secrets to their flexibility in his Shark Lab.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: While preparing for bed, the farmer manages to lock himself out of the house and is stuck outside in his pyjamas. He decides to spend the night in the barn, but his incessant snoring drives the flock mad. Shaun heads up an operation to return him to his bed without waking him up.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When a teenage Squawk goes on the rampage, DM summons her Twistyverse counterpart to talk some sense into her. But he overlooks one vital thing - a twisty Squawk is an evil Squawk.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes have found the Wishing Trident, which will help them on their quest to prevent the summoning of the legendary two-headed dragon, Iceburn. The problem is, Blossom has used one wish by mistake, and Herbert has accidentally used a second one. Now the heroes are left to defeat the dragon using only one wish, a never-ending ice cream cone (with sprinkles) and a giant spicy sausage hat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When a horrible smell ruins everyone's day at the beach, Cheese mistakenly believes she is growing stinky and is too embarrassed to go out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight for the last jar of Yummy with magic Mayan bracelets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: While playing in Mayan Temple, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Patrick leads a stranger around Bikini Bottom.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Kid villains The Terrible Three plot to steal three shapes from Odd Squad gadgets in the next phase of their plan to stop Odd Squad for good.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: A competition with goblins to see who owns Helsing?s house is settled on the grassketball court when the gang coaches a team of garden gnomes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Lance is a ping pong whizz, he always aces the annual Pottsfield Ping Pong competition. This year Danny?s determined to teach him a thing or two and has stayed up all night watching online tutorials. Now he can?t keep his eyes open long enough to play! Lance smells victory, Mick smells trouble. Mick is determined to find Danny somewhere to get a nap. However, with Joy on the prowl and Lance making things difficult it looks like Danny may never lift that trophy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 7-9 Year Olds
channel.desc: Understanding words, prefixes and suffixes, and asking questions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blow Your Mind
channel.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand van Tulleken bring you the top experts on the planet to show you things that will blow your mind. In this episode they find out about animals with human-like behaviour. Chris Packham visits chimps that tell lies, elephants that get upset and dolphins that ask for help.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: Dreams become reality, as budding writer Saanvi gets closer to her fantasy of becoming a published author. Meanwhile, the girls wake up to a shock as head teacher Mrs Tear turns boarding house matron for the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: DIY Deadly with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: In this episode, Steve delves into the lives of the animals that live in and around our backyards. He explains how beetles find a mate, unravels the mystery of a trampoline tryst and reveals otters caught on camera by a clever viewer. We see a colourful escapee, a stick insect named Steve and a caterpillar colony that puts spiders to shame. In a DIY demo, Steve then shows us how to make a super-speedy bird bath to keep our feathered friends clean and fresh.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The One Zoo Three brothers meet the zoo?s shyest animals as Cam is challenged to a game of spot the reptile, and Tyler tries to tempt Rambutan the binturong onto his new platform.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Eight-year-old Mei is half Japanese and loves learning more about Japan's culture. She doesn't get to visit as often as she would like so needs a den where she can celebrate her Japanese heritage.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: The doctors investigate what happens when blood is full of oxygen by whisking up a blood smoothie! Dr Xand visits a special medical collection of body parts to find out some ways in which human organs can go seriously wrong, and Dr Chris goes on call with an emergency ambulance team. Meanwhile, over in accident and emergency, a new admission has a seriously battered face after a bike accident, and another has a nasty infected finger from picking at his fingernails.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A special episode of the historical sketch show, featuring all your favourite songs from the series! Sing along with King Alfred about his burnt cakes, or with Henry VIII about his love of reformation - or get down Norman-style with William the Conqueror. With, of course, our host Rattus to guide the way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: The delivery of a piano creates problems for our favourite brother team - how can they move it to the upstairs studio and keep it in one piece? When the stairs become a problem, the only thing for it is to tie a rope to it and swing it from a window.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Secret Life of Boys
channel.desc: Robbie returns from Germany, and along with Thane, discovers a gift which leads to the boys setting up their own detective operation. And Corey feels that Granny Bob is outstaying her welcome.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. When symmetrical objects become vandalised, Olive and Otto must figure out why.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Preschool animation. Tweak must help her friend Sandy the sea turtle escape a hungry tiger shark.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Twig steals Cosima's volleyball. A chase leads Big Lizard and Cosima to her den... and also to a happy discovery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When the Danger Agency?s public approval ratings plummet, Colonel K brings in a truly out-of-this-world PR guru to help put things right. Alarmingly for Danger Mouse and Penfold, that guru turns out to be the galaxy?s biggest trickster ? Quark! DM is soon won over after seeing Quark demonstrate his Exaggerator Device: an invention that spins even the most mundane event into an outrageously overblown display of awesomeness. With the help of the Exaggerator, DM?s popularity skyrockets to dizzying heights, but fame comes at a price. And when Quark starts making Danger Mouse look villainous, DM will have to convince the world he?s not the criminal everyone thinks he is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Stuff is going missing all over the world, but the team are distracted, fascinated by Squawk?s new Futuroid camera, which incredibly spits out snaps of future events. DM is aghast when the camera produces a photo of him and Squawk kissing! When Penfold is abducted by an alien tractor-beam, Squawk and Danger Mouse must overcome their mutual disgust to work together. Their search for Penfold leads them to Flarg, the alien who?s been nabbing the world?s missing items. Chained upside down, and with Flarg intent on stealing everything in existence, the situation looks hopeless.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Only wood elves have ever defeated the mighty Eye of Vernon hat, so when the Riddlemaster wears the eye to take over the forest, the heroes quest to Wood Elf Wood to get help. However, Twinkle really doesn?t want to, as wood elves are so stuck up! Struggling to contain her irritation with their high-and-mighty ways, Twinkle still manages to offend them, and the heroes wonder how they will ever save the forest now.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: In an effort to fulfil an order for online star Daredevil Daiyu, the Ninjas have to challenge an unscrupulous racing car driver Victoria Villainous and win her parachute.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Can under-15s defender Sol lead his team to victory in The Floodlit Cup? Can Konan bounce back with a little help from family? Spurs legend Jenna Schillaci takes on Eloise and Holly in Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Enter the fun world of a football-mad family, where life is never quiet, and meet para-footballer Ellie as she travels to the Women's Euros.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: It's time for the racket game, where big scores mean big prizes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Another adventure with the mischievous young sheep and his flock. An unfriendly camper sets up his tent in the sheep's field.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and his mates rebel against an outbreak of unfair fun-killing rules that are being imposed on Beanotown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert is really proud of the plants he has grown ready for a visit from The Complete Gnome Gardener magazine. However, when a Wind Dragon flies through the forest destroying all his hard work, Herbert turns to desperate measures ? a barrowful of Stinkweasel?s stinkiest compost! Now, the whole forest is at risk of being overwhelmed by the smell, and the heroes must quest to get rid of it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Girl is failing science class, so Mouse offers to help her learn. However, Girl decides it will be easier to borrow one of his inventions and cheat instead. Everything is going to plan until the borrowed invention goes wrong and causes a scientific calamity.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Mouse accidentally saves Cheese's life from a toppling tree, a grateful Cheese becomes determined to thank him by doing everything she can for him. But Cheese is soon bothering Mouse all the time and her endless caring is becoming too much, causing Boy and Girl to hatch a plan to even things out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a crystal skull which gives him the power to sow discord within a group.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Mr Krabs makes Larry the Lobster temporary manager.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Little Lunch
channel.desc: The children have to find a walking buddy for the walk-a-thon.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Orwell and Onom must protect the world against Odd Squad?s greatest secret: a giant monster that sleeps in the basement and will wake up at some point this year.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Creating some clones to help with his long list of commitments, Pierce must confront his weakness for people-pleasing and learn how to set some boundaries.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Courtney challenges Owen and Jude to be the next social media star, with little success.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Life is back to normal for Roy and friends, until wild Pok?mon begin to act strangely..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: Charlie and Baz?s rivalry bubbles over before their final game of the season, and Max has to help Gordon as he tries to avert a financial crisis at Hawx.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Carter and Zane bond over their shared approach to training, while Skye and Glen realise that they are more alike than they thought.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Hey You What If?
channel.desc: The deepest hole humankind ever dug only got one thousandth of the way through the earth. But what would happen if you kept digging.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's stop-motion animation series set on a rural farm and starring one of Aardman Animations' best-loved characters. A wildlife film inspires Pidsley the cat to play a prank on the flock by disguising himself as a leopard. Shaun is convinced there is a huge beast on the loose and concocts a plan to catch it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse inherits the ancient but sprightly MK3 car after the beloved MK4 gets jammed-up. But Penfold is suspicious when the MK3 is determined to have DM all to himself.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Blossom draws the short cheese straw and, rather than join her friends on a picnic, she has to take a magic wand to the recycling centre. Faced with a long queue and a rumbly tummy, Blossom decides that life is too short for recycling - with disastrous consequences. The heroes must skip their picnic and go on a quest to save the forest from the magical mess Blossom has gotten them into.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Gramps is going to visit his old friend Zeus at their favourite childhood theme park, and the gang tags along for the ride. However, while getting there is half the fun, the kids' antics cause the van to break down! Can they work together to get Gramps to his friend before the park closes forever.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings and Grizzy collide with Santa's sled while fighting.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: SpongeBob is afraid to leave the Krusty Krab roof.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When villains break into Odd Squad HQ, the agents must figure out where they're heading before they unleash oddness everywhere.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Desperate for academic success, Pierce steals an evil mask from Helsing and uses it as his art project. The only trouble is, it turns everyone into zombies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Danny and Mick?s dad Clive has turned up with his latest in a long line of ?sure-fire? money making schemes: washing customers? cars in the car park while they use the leisure centre. The boys are happy to help and are soon scrubbing away, but when Joy finds out and demands a free wash, the boys clean her beloved old banger so hard it falls to bits. Don?t worry lads, Clive knows how to fix this? or at least replace one problem with a much bigger problem. Yeah, thanks dad.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bitesize Daily: 9-11 Year Olds
channel.desc: Metaphor and simile, imagery and analogy, and style and effect.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blow Your Mind
channel.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand van Tulleken bring you the top experts on the planet to show you things that will blow your mind. In this episode they find out how dogs use their senses. Chris Packham visits an incredible sniffer dog who can find things underwater, a dog that can tell the time and dogs who are having their brains scanned.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Our School
channel.desc: To help everyone settle at school, the girls are treated to some ?big sister? mentoring from the Year 12 students. Meanwhile, it?s all-change at the top as the hunt is on for three new head girls - but it?s not just the teachers on the panel.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: DIY Deadly with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: In this episode, Steve delves into the lives of the animals that live in our seas and on our coasts. He unravels the mystery of a curled-up British shark and a squid egg mass. In a DIY demo, Steve then shows us his secret treasure chest, which includes the most venomous animal in the oceans, a fossilised shark tooth as well as one from a sperm whale.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: Trying to solve the case of the mystery footprints, the brothers look at the animals? feet. Could it be the penguin chicks, the snow leopard cubs, or something far more peculiar.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Dengineers
channel.desc: Nine-year-old Jothi had an illness as a baby that caused his legs to not grow properly, meaning he can't visit his favourite crazy golf course. Jothi needs a crazy golf den he can access all the time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Dr Chris swallows a supercool camera pill to follow the journey that food makes through his body. Dr Xand explains how strong our bones are and meets someone who has developed the technology to grow bones in a laboratory. Also, Dr Chris is put to the test as he takes part in a realistic mock surgery scenario. Meanwhile, over in accident and emergency, one patient's race to the finishing line means a trip to surgery to fix a broken elbow, and another is admitted with a sore eye and blurred vision.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Historical sketch show. A Victorian inspector checks that school is suitably cruel, HHTV News reports live from the Great Plague, and Thumbelina drowns unpleasantly.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy wants the sports hall turned into a dance ballroom for a 60th birthday party.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Secret Life of Boys
channel.desc: Determined to stop Thane leaving for Africa, Granny Bob sets up a mock courtroom. Meanwhile, Matt finally has to confront Tabs, and Chris has to confront online trolls.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. When people in town can no longer count down, Olive and Otto must uncover who is causing the problem and why.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Join Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers, The Octonauts, for more deep sea adventures. The Octonauts roam the oceans in search of adventure and fun. Whether it's a perilous voyage to the bottom of the sea or the piratey pursuit of a giant squid, the Octonauts leap into action and always prove that eight heads are better than one. The Octonauts must help a giant sunfish who can't swim straight, before it hurts other sea creatures and itself.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard's solar-powered hoverboards run out of battery at nightfall. Can glowbugs be the answer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse explodes back into action and is instantly dismissed for destroying half of London. Can the world survive without Danger Mouse.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes have found the Wishing Trident, which will help them on their quest to prevent the summoning of the legendary two-headed dragon, Iceburn. The problem is, Blossom has used one wish by mistake, and Herbert has accidentally used a second one. Now the heroes are left to defeat the dragon using only one wish, a never-ending ice cream cone (with sprinkles) and a giant spicy sausage hat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: In order to secure the highest star rating for her restaurant, Chef Topsee turns to the Ninjas to find a giant egg for critic Jean-Pierre Point D'orgure.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Can Charlie return to goalscoring after injury? And will Ace or Julian come out on top? Martha Thomas takes on under-11 Harry in a fiercely fought Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: It's a big week for U15s striker Nick and the team as they travel to Loughborough to take part in the Premier League Nationals tournament, and we meet U11s goalie Ava Rose.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings adopt a cute insect that eats wood. And what's made of wood? The cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. The farmer wants to turn the tree in Shaun's field into firewood. The flock must take desperate measures to stop their beloved tree getting the chop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and Gnasher accidentally do good deeds for the people of Beanotown. Intrigued by the new sensation of being thanked and appreciated, they go on a 'helping rampage', leaving a wake of mayhem behind them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes aren?t really meant to do quests without Mr Friendlyface?s express permission. But when they come across a cute little squirrel queen, and she begs for their help, they find her impossible to resist. All they have to do is quest to the Tree of Certain Doom and pass his challenges. But the squirrel queen is not who she appears to be, and the heroes have to quickly un-quest their quest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Dog decides to show the family that he can be as tough as the wolves they are watching on TV. He joins a gang of street dogs and soon becomes leader of the pack. Meanwhile, the rest of the kids worry when Dog doesn?t come home and go out looking for him. However, they find that he is now too cool to be part of the 'old' family - until he is forced to make a choice between loyalty to the pack and loyalty to his best friend Boy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The family have been telling their deepest, darkest secrets to Cat for years. But when Cat finds one of Mouse?s inventions that gives her intelligence and speech, she threatens to tell all their secrets if they don't do everything she asks. The kids must decide between living under their feline pharaoh's thumb or confessing their secrets to each other.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: While falling, Grizzy performs a series of acrobatics that amazes the Lemmings.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: Patrick leads a stranger around Bikini Bottom.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Little Lunch
channel.desc: Mrs Gonsha insists the class does yoga, much to Debra-Jo?s horror.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: When some villains are invited into HQ for the annual Oddtober the 13th holiday, Orli and Ozzie find they?re a tough bunch to please.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: When a wish turns the manga-obsessed Charlie into a real-life anime hero, Pierce and Que fear they may lose their friend forever.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: TV chef Big Zuu joins Hacker, Abby and Joel in the Blue Peter studio to support Children in Need. Shini and the Blue Peter team take on an extreme bungee jump challenge, Abby visits a super sporty project, and we meet the stars from The Wicked Wizard of Oz musical.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro goes undercover for a special Children in Need prank on Apollo and recruits Sabre, Alfie Watts and Pudsey to help.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: The bros are back with a splash, kicking off with a blockbuster challenge and ThatsWatson. And it?s time to race around the ultimate obstacle course - on water.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: General strikes! Surplus women! Deadly mummy?s curses! Winston Churchill fangirling over Charlie Chaplin! Take a trip to the Roaring Twenties.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: The Scions have lost their power source on Earth, and the enemy is using it to become even stronger. But with hard work and a little creativity, the heroes find a new way to channel their strength.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall tracks down the ultimate aquatic athlete. Taking mega-migrations around the Atlantic and Pacific oceans, the blue sharks are ocean Olympians. Steve catches up with a couple of these bolts of blue off the Californian coast, before heading to the Shark Lab to reveal how these canny creatures rely on their super-liver to provide buoyancy, and hitch a ride on ocean currents, allowing these athletes to make mega-migrations across the great oceans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. The farmer is sick in bed, and with Bitzer playing nursemaid, it's down to Shaun to handle the daily chores around the farm - with disastrous results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Having put the Danger Babies through their adorable paces, Professor Squawkencluck leaves it to Danger Mouse to settle them down with a nice soothing story. Unfortunately telling stories to children isn't one of Danger Mouse's strong points, and he ends up scaring his captive audience with a tale that reimagines him as an evil villain. Squawk returns to find Danger Mouse bound and gagged and that the Danger Babies have made off with the Danger Car and are on their way to Arkwirght Asylum to free the 'heroes' from Danger Mouse's topsy-turvy story.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Gnasher becomes the star of an action movie, playing Grizzly's on-screen sidekick. But filming keeps him and Dennis apart, leaving Dennis feeling lonely. Could Dennis and Gnasher really become Grizzly and Gnasher.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Ripped Ab-Man asks Boy to help him win a game show, his siblings worry that he is being taken advantage of and decide to investigate.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Having transformed himself into a teenager to help expose a nest of vampires at school, Helsing displays no class when he joins Daisy's bullies instead.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
channel.desc: A sea bunny ravages Squidward's garden.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy snares a swordfish, but the Lemmings lure it out to sea. The cabin starts to slide.

channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: A rock fault releases steam that propels the Lemmings high into the sky.

channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Syren in a flooded Paris.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: TV chef Big Zuu joins Hacker, Abby and Joel in the Blue Peter studio to support Children in Need. Shini and the Blue Peter team take on an extreme bungee jump challenge, Abby visits a super sporty project, and we meet the stars from The Wicked Wizard of Oz musical.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Stage Stars
channel.desc: Senior dancer Jakob is hoping to compete in the world?s most prestigious ballet competition, but he has suffered an injury that could shatter his dreams. Meanwhile, the pressure is on for the Anything Goes cast, as rehearsals are hotting up and showtime is fast approaching ? but there is always time for a classroom takeover.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Game on Grandparents
channel.desc: Guided by pro-gamer Slogo, the teams serve up an epic game of Switch Sports Tennis. Who will ace it and bag a place in the finals.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: With the help of Odd Squad, Delivery Debbie and Delivery Doug must figure out why their food is disappearing.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Dinosaurs break out of the dinosaur room in headquarters, and Olive and Otto must travel back in time to save the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Spooky Files
channel.desc: It?s Bert?s 11th birthday, and a Faceless Spooky appears and starts freezing people in time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pickle Storm
channel.desc: The Hairy Egg is ready to hatch and Pickle is keeping it safe. There is widespread panic when it disappears and Pickle's parents forget who they are. Time is running out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Worst Witch
channel.desc: When Mildred?s new friend Jessica lures her to the Crystal Lake, Mildred breaks all the rules to go and meet her, and she discovers that all is not what it seems.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Football Academy
channel.desc: Can under-15s defender Sol lead his team to victory in The Floodlit Cup? Can Konan bounce back with a little help from family? Spurs legend Jenna Schillaci takes on Eloise and Holly in Skill Showdown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: With morale at rock bottom, Coach Byrne takes his Hawx players into the wilderness. Back at the academy, the U12s undergo an unusual detention.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Leshawna creates a paint-balloon fight to decide who she will take to an amusement park.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Owen struggles with the idea that he is about to lose his BFF Noah to a gifted military school.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: It?s staff appreciation day at Danger HQ, and Squawk and Danger Mouse have two very different ideas on where to go. Penfold has the deciding vote, so the pair are busy trying to convince Penfold to pick their choice. With Penfold busy inventing tasks so they can earn his favour, no one has noticed that a jam spillage in the professor?s experiment has brought a sticky surprise to life - a super-sized jam monster which might just ruin all of their plans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Whilst waiting to pick up Penfold?s vacationing cousin from New Zealand, Pinfold, at the airport, Danger Mouse receives orders to stop Burt Badboy?s spree of mass statue defacement. When Penfold pops to the toilet moments before Pinfold arrives, a distracted DM mistakenly jets off with Penfold?s cousin in tow, leaving Penfold stranded at the airport. As DM races off to stop Badboy, unwittingly bringing Pinfold along for the ride, Penfold commandeers various modes of transport hoping to catch up with them at Nelson?s Column, a pristine tempting target for Badboy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold?s countless hours spent playing Giraffe Warriors pay off when he gets the highest score of all time. Before he can celebrate and convince Danger Mouse that a video game win is a real life win, the pair are whisked off to the planet which inspired the game, where Penfold is asked to defend it from an alien invasion! With DM sidelined Penfold must take up the mantle of the last giraffe warrior, a hero destined to save the planet from peril.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mrs. Rodriguez?s cat, Mr Boots, becomes friends with Cat and comes over to the house to play ? a lot! But soon Mr Boots? never ending energy starts to annoy Cat and when she tells him that she needs some space, Mr. Boots is hurt and goes on the rampage. Can the kids fix this before Mrs. Rodriguez finds out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Girl and Cheese choose Cat to DJ the family's upcoming party. However, Boy, Dog and Mouse think Cat will become the focus of the party that's supposed to be for all of them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Dog's rivalry with the mail woman comes to a head, she goes on leave - which means none of the siblings will get the important package they ordered.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy wants a peaceful day for his birthday, but the Lemmings have other plans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Stinkweasel drops a rain of yukkiness onto the forest, the Fairy Squad, with their excellent flying skills, decide they are the ones for the job. However, Hoofius insists this should be their quest, even if he does hate ick! And when the Fairy Squad get their wings gunked and are unable to fly, the heroes can resume their quest to end Stinkweasel?s reign of stinky nonsense - no flying required.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert has invented a new contraption to help him fly using an old set of bagpipes. The 'Herbecopter', as Herbert likes to call it, is rather noisy but extremely effective, and Twinkle is unhappy at no longer being the only flying hero. So, when the heroes quest to get Friendlyface?s priceless locket back from a dragon, Twinkle and Herbert become extremely competitive and risk completely failing the quest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Blossom accidentally uses a witch?s broom to make sticks for toasting marshmallows, the owner of the broom casts a spell of squeaky voices on all the heroes. The spell will be lifted once the heroes have returned with new broomstick branches. A simple enough quest, think the heroes, until they realise that a witch?s broom can only be made from the branches of the Really Spooky Tree.
